# {{ $frontmatter.title }}

The `taskCheckboxWithAppend`-helper will ...

```handlebars
  {{taskCheckboxWithAppend}}
```

when used with this context:

```json
{
  path: 'notepages/school/My Cool Page',
  name: 'My Cool Page is here!'
}
```

will result in:

````markdown
...
````
